website_summaries.verdict: A kit with 4 must-have products that work well with any get nail colors to create beautiful, long-lasting manicures.
pros: This kit offers the products you need to ensure healthy nails and lasting results, including moisturizing cuticle oil, base and bonding coats, and top coat
Manicures may last 21 one days when used as instructed
cons: Products take a while to cure
A few customers gripe about receiving kits that were missing at least one bottle

customer_reviews.title: This kit is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond happy with my purchase. I'm not a nail painting kind of gal, but I wanted my fingertips to look more lady like, minus chipped polish and a big price tag from the salon. I took a chance and bought my tools, including this kit. 6 days later and not a single chip! And this is my first time ever applying gel to my nails myself. I goofed and got a little on my cuticles, which is a big no-no, but the polish still hasn't chipped. I also apply the oil to my cuticles everyday and they don't look messy and ragged. This lit is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ebonyx

customer_reviews.title: This kit is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This kit is very easy to use, and, so far, I have used it with different brands of gel polish, without any issues. The top coat, "Top it Off," is super shiny and durable. Be careful about flooding the cuticles with this top coat, because the viscosity is on the thinner-moderate side. The "Foundation" gel, has the shorter tipped brush applicator, and the viscosity of this product is on the thicker side. The pH Bond is pretty basic. The "Nourish" cuticle oil has a pleasant smell, and, is comparable to other cuticle oils.
customer_reviews.author: Kousaka-san

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and cures in my LED lamp in 30-60 seconds. Note for those new at doing their own gel nails: Especially with the top coat, be sure to wipe off any excess when you take the brush out of the bottle. Because it is clear, it is easy to put too much on and not really see that it's pooling at your cuticles. Then once you cure it, theres not much you can do. That was my newbie mistake - but now that I know, it works perfectly and looks great every time!
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: quality is poor
customer_reviews.text: Im not a newbie with doing my nails and the brand gelish is one of my go-tos but I’m not sure what is wrong with combo set I purchased here. All the bottles except for the ph bond the liquid is bunching up together which doesn’t allow me to apply a smooth finish. The gel is very gooey inside. It’s more likely a fake product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous nails 💖
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for gel nails. Easy and lasts on my nails. I’ve had this polish on for over 3 weeks. No chipping or peeling. Sure theres out growth but that’s has no reflection on the quality of this fabulous gel nail polish set. Makes my nails look like I had them done at a professional salon👍👍The pictures are the day I did them and about 3 weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please be advised !
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the purchase because I received it today and it only had 3 of the 4 polish’s I was supposed to get ! Can’t tell you how good it works because I can’t properly use this set !
customer_reviews.author: 123wow

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: I only received 3 of the 4 bottles... how does one even put that out for shipping seeing that the kit wasn’t complete?!? It’s called the fantastic four for gods sake!
customer_reviews.author: jenbrown

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cure well
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t cure well - I was excited to try the gelish foundation and top coat having used other less expensive brands in the past. Turns out the gelish foundation and top coat don’t cure well. Left my nails extremely sticky even after using a cotton swab with alcohol to remove the tackiness. I had much better results with Clavuz for the base and top coats. I do however like the Gelish color coats. I would not purchase this set again and in fact, I would return it if Amazon allowed returns on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Evenson

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t authentic gelish . This is a fake the product doesn’t work like gelish and there are a few indications on the packaging that let you know it’s no real. Very disappointing. You should not be selling fake professional products
customer_reviews.author: nail chick

customer_reviews.title: Pésimo! Mala calidad.
customer_reviews.text: La base deja grumos o burbujas, igual que el top coat. Pense que al ser un producto caro iba a ser buena calidad pero no. Pésimo producto. No gasten su dinero. Creo que no es original. The base leaves lumps or bubbles, just like the top coat. I thought that being an expensive product was going to be good quality but no. Terrible product Do not spend your money.
customer_reviews.author: Luis y Elieth Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Great Gel Set!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the Red Carpet brand versions of all four of these Gelish ones. Gelish is by far noticeably longer lasting and easier to cure. I love the small brush on the Foundation base coat. Don’t love how sticky it is and how it tends to drip down the bottle when trying to wipe excess off the brush, makes the bottle all sticky. Fixable by wiping with acetone. Really love the wide and rounded brush on the Top It Off top coat! It makes application super easy and top coat is lovely shiny. (Attached photo was my very first time ever using tips and testing what this Fantastic Four and gel color over top would look and last like.)
customer_reviews.author: ✌️✌️

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a bi weekly alternative to do yourself though look no further
customer_reviews.text: A few of the bottles leak if they don’t stay upright. The product is easy to use however the longevity of the product does not stay on super long and they peel up easily. If you’re looking for a bi weekly alternative to do yourself though look no further. I’ve gotten many compliments on my nails and I don’t have to spend a ton of money getting them done, just wish they product would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Madison B

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware Please Read first (crappy product)
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy these products! After preparing the nail correctly... This brand of the 1. They take forever to dry 2. You will definitely need multiple coats!!! And it’s never even 3. It remained sticky even after I put it in the Led/UV Gel Nail Lamp Note:! At the nail salon the OPI polish covers beautifully and evenly in 1 coat whereas this product is so thin and does NOT cover evenly! Note: It reminds me of that “peel of nail polish for kids”. The polish my little granddaughters received for Christmas which acts the same way and doesn’t last! Terrible product I returned promptly!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Great for DIY
customer_reviews.text: Since COVID, I’m not getting my usual biweekly mania or monthly pedis. I had a UV light box for gel from several years ago. I dug it out and ordered this set so I could DIY. I did the 180 sec setting on my light box for each coat. I’m pretty impressed and likely to continue to DIY even when it’s safe to be back in the salons. Glad to get this four pack of full sized bottles at such a great price. Was able to purchase this and a color (Gelish Primrose and Proper is the color if your curious from the pics) for the cost of one mani.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn C.

customer_reviews.title: These exact steps are all you need!
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the steps correctly, the end result is awesome. Took me a few tries to get it right but now I love doing my nails! 1. Ph Bond 2. Foundation then cure under light 3. Brush the ‘tackiness’ off nails (Makeup brush works well) 4. Polish then cure 5. Top it off then cure 6. Soak a cotton ball with alcohol and wipe nails 7. Nourish on cuticles
customer_reviews.author: Feliz87

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last. Not a good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the gelish brand before and it’s never done what this set has been doing. The gel just peels off my nails. When I use my other gel polishes, they usually last about 2 weeks or even longer. This hasn’t even last 3 days! I’m trying to return the item or get a refund! This was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Gutshall

customer_reviews.title: Easy long lasting gel nails
customer_reviews.text: My nails look exactly like the salon. They went from $25 - $38 ? at the salon. It took me longer because Im disolvong my old gels proberly and not rushing then scaping it off the way they do in the salon, once its off and I file,cut cuticles and buff the actual process of applying new color is fast and easy. Just make sure you apply ultra thin coats of foundation, nail color and top coat otherwise it will be thick and bumpy looking..and it should last 2-3 weeks . I go to salon for designs only now they charge $5
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: All of these were sticky and old. Thought it was my light then tried different polish and sure enough this was the problem. Sticky top coat sticky base coat
customer_reviews.author: Amerie

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought and used these with the Gellen polishes. So far I get anywhere from 7-10 days. I’m still new to the DIY gel nails. I don’t do any kind of touch ups. I’m a nurse and wash/sanitize my hands a gazillon times a day and on my days off I do the usual housework. I keep my nails fairly short for sanitary reasons. Normal polish chips within a couple of days despite expensive top coats, I’ve tried many.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Now I can do my own shellac. Works just ...
customer_reviews.text: Now I can do my own shellac. Works just as expected. No more disappointing nail salon visits where I have to pay and walk out wondering why I ever went in or having to argue with a nail tech about not using the nail drill on my healthy nails. Only downside, I find it hard to soak off but I guess that could mean it lasts longer :)
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: Yes !
customer_reviews.text: I watched about 10 youtube videos and just went for it. This gel polish set is bomb.com. I really believe as long as you have this product as the base and top coat it’ll make any gel polish look great. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: A bad knockoff, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I normally love gelish...I think this must be a knockoff! They are super goopy, bottles leak A LOT! No matter how tight the lid is screwed on..they leak. And the top coat dries yellowish!! Yuck!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl6

customer_reviews.title: Full size bottles, goes on smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I decided I’m going to start doing my own gel nails at home. I’m spending way to much money at these salons. I pay attention to the products they use and I found all of them on amazon. I have the UV/LED curing lamp, gel polish remover, different color polishes. Full size bottles, goes on smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: PinCkButterfly

customer_reviews.title: Empty bond bottle
customer_reviews.text: Received all 4 bottles in the original packaging without any damage but the bond bottle was completely empty! I saw other reviewers say the same thing too so I guess it must evaporate or spill out on its own but it dries to nothing very quickly so it leaves no trace. For the price I guess it’s fine. Good product just won’t be repurchasing online.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Alonso

customer_reviews.title: no returns? bummed I have to keep this
customer_reviews.text: Ugh, no returns??? :( Honestly the only thing I liked in this set was the pH bond. It dried my nails nicely, HOWEVER The foundation coat and top it off coat would NOT set under my UV/LED gel lamp - no matter how long I tried to set the coatings. Bottom line: not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are a beginner like me, this is everything you have been looking for :)
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to apply, just go slow and use very thin layers, less is more. The foundation will stay pretty sticky after you put it in the lamp (I bought a cheap one off of amazon) I applied regular nail polish on top and then waited for it to completely dry before applying the topcoat. Make sure to wipe with some alcohol after because the topcoat will remain sticky after putting it in the lamp to cure. I really messed up the first time but I did some research and this information helped me. My nails look so cute, I'm really happy :) give it a shot! (p.s. I almost never leave reviews, I'm that blown away)

customer_reviews.title: So happy; I get biweekly manicures now
customer_reviews.text: Best investment from amazon this far. I am so happy with this purchase I can’t even tell you. Everything you need is right here and it’s super user friendly. Just be careful to put thin, even coats so you don’t get hick or misshaped nails. It took me two tries and it looks like I just left a salon but I didn’t have to spend $35+. Not gonna lie, I’ve done my nails like three times this week... why... because I can! So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been spending $40 every two weeks to get my nails done. Finally decided I could do it myself. Easy to use. I learned what not to do quickly after doing the first hand, and my second hand looks perfect. What not to do: 1. Make sure not to use too much foundation as it spreads a little when it's under the lights. 2. After the top coat, wipe off with an alcohol wipe (otherwise it's sticky and you won't think it's set). 3. The soak off procedure can be a bit messy. But be patient and just let it soak. The stuff will pop right off.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Stamps

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Finally used this for the first time a week ago. Every single nail became bubbly and started peeling withing 3 to 4 days. I haven't had this problem with the other 3 brands I use. This is junk. After 5 days it just needed to be taken off because it looked so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Healdlesley

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I've been using with BMC colors also bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I've been using with BMC colors also bought on Amazon. You definitely have to wipe with an alcohol swab at the end. I bought a big pack of swabs on Amazon like what diabetics use when testing blood sugar. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's an old formula or a bad batch. I did get a refund
customer_reviews.text: I tried at least 5 different times to get this set to work with my nails. Nothing worked. The polish peeled off immediately. Not sure if it's an old formula or a bad batch. I did get a refund. Hoping to find a better replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Misty L.

customer_reviews.title: No casing around product. Ph bond leaked on everything
customer_reviews.text: After opening my package that looked like it had been through a garbage disposal I opened my box to smell the Ph bond coming from box immediately. The top opened and over half the amount of ph bonder fluid leaked out. I’ve bought this brand before and had no issues with there packaging but there was no protection for the caps of the polishes, not surprised one opened after how it arrived looking like it may have been run over before reaching my door step.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Great Clear Coats
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a gel mani that can last me two weeks! I would recommend these clear polishes to anyone and everyone. I usually do a double top coat when doing my mani, then a top coat one week in to ensure it will last. I use the gelish clear coats with Gellen gel color and I haven’t had any issues. The brushes aren’t all the same size but they all work great.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but it peels easily.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I have good luck with the application of this product, but this polish peels off of my nails very easily. I purchased this because i had read that this polish doesn't chip or peel, and it does both for me. I really love the different applicator brushes and think all of them are well suited to their particular product. I like the short brush for the base coat.
customer_reviews.author: LOTREowyn

customer_reviews.title: The Fantastic Four
customer_reviews.text: The Fantastic Four is a great product it comes with all the essentials for a gel manicure and the bottles are regular size and NOT the minis. This product arrived fairly quick!
customer_reviews.author: SpeedyJenn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing set for the price! They are full sized bottles which I love and they will last forever! This is my first experience doing gel nails myself and the only issue I ran into was the top it off was a lot more loose than the foundation and I had to clean it up a bit to keep it off my cuticles and sides of my nails. It may be that I'm going on too thick with the coats, but I didn't seem to have an issue with the foundation being runny so I can't be sure. Everything worked great and cured very well and I would definitely recommend buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Honestly Gelish is the BEST top coat and bottom coat brand out there.... I have been doing at home gel manicures for about a year now but previously using the brand “Gellen” for my top/bottom coat. My manicures usually would only last 5 days top and always chip easily. I was hesitant to buy Gelish because of the price but I knew it was a good quality since salons use it. And i was right. So far I am on day 7 and going strong. Highly recommend to splurge a little and buy!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Gelish 4 lyf!
customer_reviews.text: Nail Harmony Gelish Gel Polish Fantastic Four Top Base Ph Bond Nourish Oil 0.5oz Perfect kit for getting started! I had just gotten a LED light and was looking for some good colors for polish to get started. I cam across this which has everything you need in it for a successful gel manicure. It does not come with any color so I did purchase that seperatly. I love this brand and the way the nails came out was beautiful. I have had the same color on for almost 2 weeks now and not one scratch or lifting of the polish! I will be buying more colors in the very near future and staying with this great brand!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Harden
customer_reviews.text: I even bought a different higher wattage lamp thinking it was my lamp. But after 3 mins under a professional 120w uv lamp these did not harden. DEFECTIVE PRODUCT I CANT EVEN RETURN.
customer_reviews.author: IG

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly good. The Fantastic Four is all you need for a long lasting gel manicure. My pictures show the great result of two weeks of house work with 0 chipping or lifting. I am sure that I could go one more week if I wanted to, but I love to have nicely fresh manicure every two weeks. After spending so much money on base & top gel that claimed to be good, Im happy I found these. Love the fantastic 4.
customer_reviews.author: C.Paulino

customer_reviews.title: Seller should be more up front on quality
customer_reviews.text: I love gelish. After spending a good hour trying to figure out if these were authentic I have to complain just a little. The shrink wrap on this was definitely not original. A label on one of the bottles was crooked as well which really threw me off. I have to imagine that perhaps this seller gets seconds? I am 100% ok with buying seconds but should be told that so I don't have to wonder if what I'm buying is the real deal. I decided to just go for it. Having used gelish for years I do believe they are authentic.
customer_reviews.author: geekypeach

customer_reviews.title: TOP COAT WORKS WITH RUBBING ALCOHOL
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this product and used the top coat it did not cure and the nails were still sticky. I was disappointed because this brand was supposed to be good. BUT after doing my research, all I had to do was put rubbing alcohol after the nails cured with the GELISH top coat and it worked! The sticky layer went away AND under the sticky layer was a beautiful glossy nail! So I highly recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: JORGE M VILLASENOR

customer_reviews.title: More than worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These are the full sized products, not the minis they sell at Sally’s. I love the bonder, it’s the key to a long lasting mani. The topcoat is super glossy and these products have worked well with every brand I’ve used along side them. I’ve even layered chrome powder with these products and I haven’t had any issues with just one layer on top of the chrome. I’ve used these products for both manis and pedis and both have stood the test of time!
customer_reviews.author: kendall beauford

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Came beautifully packaged and shipping did not take long at all. All polished were included, brand new and never opened. I used each polish while curing them with my melodie Susie UV nail lamp. At first I noticed it was still sticky after curing under the light for 2 mins and then tried wiping them with a cotton swab of acetone and it dried perfectly. I continue with each polish, first painting, then curing and then wiping with acetone. They came out great. Aside from my terrible paint job which needs practice lol the polishes worked great. Definitely recommend. Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it was to do my nails .... but do need to lightly wipe top coat I found with rubbing alcohol was a bit tacky before I did this .. second time doing my own nails with gel first try last over a week and only cause I wanted a color change did I redo them.,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There's a burning sensation when used with a 48W UV/LED Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a nail tech/professional, but I did some research on DIY gel nails. Based on the chemical formulation of the gel polishes and the type of lamp used to cure them, you can under or overcure the gel polish. From my understanding, the burning sensation is due to overcuring (aka using a lamp too "powerful" for this formulation). However, it's not so bad with my lamp when I apply a thin layer and the burning sensation goes away after a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: NSR12

customer_reviews.title: Full-size bottles. Great Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Because of Covid I could not go to the nail shop so this was the next best thing. These are amazing I feel like I am a nail technician when using these products. So much better than the Sally Hansen kit I started with it.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you expect
customer_reviews.text: Good kit and saves me a trip to the supply store. Im a professional nail tech and the gel lasts 2 or 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: AMorell

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect with my lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand I've used since I started doing my own gel manicures, so I don't have anything to compare them to, BUT they get the job done, so that's all that matters. I've used this entire set for maybe five manicures now, each manicure lasting for two weeks before I got tired of the color and decided to change it. Works perfect with my lamp, dries easy, stays hard, stays shiny. All I need!
customer_reviews.author: TheWilliams'

customer_reviews.title: Sticky finish
customer_reviews.text: After curing the top coat, it dries very sticky. It's not a smooth gel-like finish. But instead it very sticky after curing with my LED machine
customer_reviews.author: Molidy sar

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This did not deliver as pictured. The polishes were wrapped in bubble wrap. As I opened them, I see the “Top it Off” polish has cracked open and leaked all over the other polishes. I waited ever a week for these to deliver... and now I can’t use the top coat.
customer_reviews.author: KieraB

customer_reviews.title: Love this Gel Kit
customer_reviews.text: I frequently do my own nails and previously had the mini kit. I love this purchase of the kit in 15ml. The picture is accurate of what they look like. I love that the foundation brush is small and helps to keep it off of your skin and only directly on the nail. The Top it off brush is much larger and is easy to cover the whole nail in one stroke. Love this kit and will continue to purchase this one when my current set runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Birk

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good not amazing but good. It is thin with a good layer of top coat. It is scratch resistant. Shiny.. but not that glossy. Just shiny. It is also long lasting I’ve had the on for 3 weeks and they are still good. While I do my normal life.. dishes laundry work etc.. also at the finish you have to wipe off so the sticky layer would go away.
customer_reviews.author: Ly

customer_reviews.title: Order is missing Nourish bottle
customer_reviews.text: My UV/ LED nail lamp finally arrived so I just unboxed my Fantastic 4 essentials last night. It was missing the Nourish bottle and instead had 2 of the pH bond bottles! I don't see a way to contact the seller to correct this?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will Only Buy These!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! So much cheaper buying these full-sized bottles as compared to going to Sally’s and getting smaller bottles for more money! Easy to use- only tip I would give would be no need to be overly-generous. Less is definitely better in terms of cure for all layers!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great set to have for your gel manicure
customer_reviews.text: Love this compared to other brands I tried. My gel manicures look very well down, recommend using with Gelish gel polish, if you mix with other cheaper brands it doesn’t work as well but not because of this product. Bought some gelish polishes and it looks like I went to a salon.
customer_reviews.author: Bricam

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, Ive been itching to buy these 4 for a long time. My only problem is that it came without a box, lightly wrapped in bubble wrap. And it was just bouncing around the box. It could’ve ended badly honestly but I’m glad mine came in unscathed. If you’re not going to put it in it’s original box then please put more cushioning so others can enjoy this too.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little iffy about all the mixed reviews with this product but I am happy I tried it! Shipping was quick and everything was full and in one piece once it was received. I do my own gel manis at home and this holds up for about 2 weeks! (dishes, dog walking, toddler life, etc.) The nourishing bottle smells so good and makes my cuticles as good as new again. Will definitely purchase again once this set runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. I was forced like everyone one else to do my own nails because of this pandemic and I saw quite a few good reviews on this Gelish brand on YouTube. I really like these products. You will need a UV or LED light to use these.
customer_reviews.author: Fynedyme

customer_reviews.title: Great, salon quality products!
customer_reviews.text: After going to the salon every two weeks to have a gel manicure done on my nails for the last two years, the quarantine left me feeling desperate! I bought this set (knowing Gelish is an amazing brand), the $10 mini UV light and a couple of CND colors and gave it a go! My nails turned out great, the product work exactly as expected and my manicure has lasted the full two weeks! The product was not shipped in the box shown in the listing but they arrived safely bubble wrapped! I would highly recommend this set for at-home gel nails!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time using gel
customer_reviews.text: I’m a first timer using gel polish at home and I love this set. It lasts for about 1 week to 1.5 weeks without chipping for me. Though I don’t scratch my nails underneath much, it leaves them in better condition and means I can peel off the polish layer when it finally does chip.
customer_reviews.author: Jullianna

customer_reviews.title: I'm overall happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm soso excited that I purchased this and TRUST me I will purchase more when I run out. I usually buy gel nail polish that is on the cheaper side but what balances it out is that I buy a strong base and strong coat. I absolutely love this package it completes the perfect look and along with that it has absolutely everything you need. Even cuticle oil! which is my favorite part. I love this product and I love how my nails look when I use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rubia Posas

customer_reviews.title: Bottle malfunctiom when trying to open
customer_reviews.text: Bottle snapped (glass shards and liquid flew everywhere) on nourish bottle. Ruined shirt and jeans with oil stains.
customer_reviews.author: keenan

customer_reviews.title: Just buy one with the Foundation and Top Coat
customer_reviews.text: I like it - although I rarely use the PH bond bottle and the nourish is just like a cuticle oil - so you don't really have to have those. I had to have a replacement sent because it was originally shipped to me in a plastic bag and the bottle broke during shipment. I like it and use it every week or so - it's great that I can do my own nails and not have to pay salon prices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend 3 out of 4
customer_reviews.text: While I like three of the four products, I could never get the top coat to cure or dry. No matter how many times I used the UV/led light it was sticky. I probably won't buy again. I loved the texture of the base coat.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for professional at home results
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this line for several years. I love the new bottle shape and wider applicator brushes. My nails always look professionally done and do not chip. If my nails didn’t grow quickly I could get over 3 weeks without touching up. I also use the additional builder step.
customer_reviews.author: S313

customer_reviews.title: Great product, amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I will continue to buy from this seller. Not only is the product amazing, the customer service is amazing!!! I have already been recommending and sharing this product with my family and friend to purchase also! Thanks so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Williams

customer_reviews.title: Can't even get them to last a week
customer_reviews.text: I was meticulous about the process of applying this product and used the same brand gel color. It looked amazing for the first two days. After that, the shine is gone, and if you can make it one week without chips or peels, you are very lucky.
customer_reviews.author: B. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Doing my own nails
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because it contained everything I was told to get to start doing my own nails. I have used all of the items in the set for each time I do my nails, the quality is great and the final look is flawless. People can't believe I do my own nails at home and I must say, I didn't think I could do so well either! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Not that good look for something else
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is the real thing, probably a really impressive dupe or it’s just a bad product. The top coat is super sticky and when I wipe it off it’s still sticky and ruins the color and texture of my gel underneath
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginner like myself. I was skeptical at first because the base was a little goopy and I wasn't sure if it was supposed to be like that or if the product is older. Still not sure actually but either way it still cures properly and the top coat is nice and glossy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Better than regular polish.
customer_reviews.text: Regular nail polish chips within a day and is ruined in 5 days. I also end up smudging it while it dries. The salon gel chipped after 16 days and was ruined after a month. This chips after 5-7 days and is ruined in 14 days. It lifts from the bottom primarily, once the polish has grown away from the cuticle. If i take great care in leveling the edges so they are thin and smooth it lasts longer. I love the instant dry with the led dryer--no more nail polish smudges on my shoes!
customer_reviews.author: L. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottles and leaked all over
customer_reviews.text: Was not in box as in picture. Top Coat bottle was broken at the base of neck. So top coat contents were all over all other products. Extremely disappointed. Cant return a broken bottle.
customer_reviews.author: hmayers

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Comes with bonder, base gel, too gel and cuticle oil. I feel like the brush are easy to easy especially the base gel brush!! Will buy again! Does leave a tacky layer after cure and it doesn’t run on the sides. They are thick
customer_reviews.author: hilda Balleza

customer_reviews.title: I almost gave up on home gel kit
customer_reviews.text: changing to gelish has made all the difference in my home gel manicures. The prior brand I used did not stay well but was somehow still hard to remove when I wanted to. This stays well and is easy to remove with acetone
customer_reviews.author: Abi A.

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Love this four piece set. Very good value, and you get a lot of product. I use the Nourish nearly every day, and the base and top coats are very good. The ph bonder is ok, just seems to dehydrate the nail plate, so I could take it or leave it, but all in all, I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Skrymmorie

customer_reviews.title: Lasts longer than other brands, better quality too
customer_reviews.text: Gelish is my favorite brand of uv nail products. I've used 4 other brands, and none of them have the Thickness and staying power as gelish does. I'll never use any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottles leak when closed and on its side.
customer_reviews.text: These work great, however, I had a lot of product wasted because the bottles would leak when the bottles were closed shut on their side. 10/10 for product itself 3/10 for poor packaging.
customer_reviews.author: shirleyq

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last more than a few days
customer_reviews.text: I followed all the instructions and have used other versions before, but this has lasted the shortest duration and takes the longest to apply because there are so many layers
customer_reviews.author: Du Dang

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is different
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is ok however it does not come in the package shown in the add. It simply comes wrapped in bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: AZM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that the product came cracked and doesn’t dry at all with my lamp. But overall the packaging was okay and the bottle sizes was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Vega

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during the pandemic and it was so worth it. They use this at my nail salon. I’ve been doing my own nails and my family’s nail also. It doesn’t come off until you take I off.
customer_reviews.author: BeautifulTee

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottle and spilled liquid
customer_reviews.text: This product was clearly not packaged properly as one of the bottles was broken upon opening and there was liquid spilled all over the package. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Use alcohol wipe
customer_reviews.text: I’m revising my review cause I just read online you need to wipe the top coat after curing with an alcohol swab. I know my nail tech always does this but I didn’t realize why she did it. Top coat will not cure. Others bottles are good. Without the top coat curing it’s pretty useless. I have strong uv light too.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Boshnack

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this kit works wonderful except the top coat it stays sticky no matter what. But a trick is to use hand sanitizer to fix that issue. Other than that It's awesome I love the smell of the oil for the cuticles.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Chipped after two days.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this set. It was easy to apply and looked great for the first day. Unfortunately, by day two it started to chip. I've tried it with several different brands of color and it's always the same story. The only thing I can think of is maybe my UV light isn't working as well as it used to. I'm open to suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Salon-like Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kit because it's what my nail gal uses, and I know the quality is good. Overall I'm happy with the product and it worked great, but the bottles came wrapped in bubble wrap, and not in a box. I'm assuming they're new, but it would have been nice to get the box too..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It comes with a wipe off top coat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for someone looking to start using gel polish. It’s one of the top brands. Great quality. Only downfall is the old school tacky layer of top coat. U know the one u have to wipe off with alcohol. Now days there’s so many “no-wipe” top coats that it’s just an extra unnecessary step.
customer_reviews.author: Elle medrano

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting shine
customer_reviews.text: Gelish is my favourite gel polish brand as far as top coat goes. Great shine that lasts. I’ve used it for my toes, polygel nails, and on top of dip powder. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: good!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried it with nail polish of this brand and with others brands and in both opportunities it works very well. I took it out after 10 days to try a new color but when I remove it it is really very good and I could have it for more days.
customer_reviews.author: Graciana Broglio

customer_reviews.title: Gelish the best.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Gelish products for a long time. This one is the real deal. Some are selling a phony product saying it is Gelish. This one is real. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lula Stock

customer_reviews.title: It is peeling off waaay to easily. Not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. I used the primer, base, and top coat and I am not impressed. It comes out thick, and is soft after curing. I was expecting this to be a more professional finish but I've already had to redo half of my nails due to peeling. It is peeling off waaay to easily. Not impressed at all. I had better luck with Sally Hansen.
customer_reviews.author: Raelyn Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality. The price seems a little high but if you have tried cheaper products then you would know why this brand is worth it. The polish looks fresh even after 2 weeks of working.
customer_reviews.author: SherryB04

customer_reviews.title: Even using this per the instructions, and plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: Even using this per the instructions, and plenty of prep. It starts to peel in a day or two. Capped tips and no overcoat on skin
customer_reviews.author: Papa Bear

customer_reviews.title: Polish still peels!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this line after seeing it in nail shops and unfortunately the polish does not last. I used this last night with another brands color polish and my nails peeled today. This can't be the same polish they are using in the salons. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this! First time doing my own gels and it was so easy and a ton cheaper than salon. Best in this bundle for lowest price. Big bottles will last quite a while. I'll def repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Needed for a good gel manicure
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. The set came complete with the PH, foundation, top coat, and nourishment. The brush sizes for all nail polishes were perfect. The nourishment smelled really good and game my nails shine and my hands moisture. My manicure is 3 days old in this picture.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY ARMSTEAD

customer_reviews.title: VERY happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE gelish products. They are just....the best. I’ve done my nails twice now with this kit and I will definitely buy again when I need more product. It works best with gelish color polish and I would absolutely recommend using all 4 products as designed. It really makes a difference in how long your manicure will last.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila O'Patchen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dry well leaving nails dull.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t seem to get this to dry well so my nails end up looking dull when finished. I even let extra time under the lamp. Disappointed the return window has closed because I’d rather return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a good value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pack. Works well. Some of the bottles always get gooey over time and I'm not sure why the do this, but it's a good product that saves me money since I can do my gel nails at home.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Davis

product_meta.title: Gelish Fantastic Four Essentials Collection Soak Off Gel Nail Polish Kit, 15 mL
feature_bullets: Foundation base gel creates an adhesive bond between nail and gel product
pH Bond nail prep dehydrates the nail plate for optimal performance
Nourish Cuticle Oi hydrates the skin around the nail and cuticles
Top It Off gel creates the ultimate finish with a high shine
Requires use of Gelish LED drying curing lamp

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
